{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-300 |revision=A1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/14/2007 |manuf_country= |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRG-G19 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2DIR300A1 |ic_id=4216A-IR300 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2317 |cpu1_cspeed=183 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=25X32VFIG |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V281620FTP-H |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2317 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:1E:58,00:21:91 |oui_eth=00:1E:58,00:21:91 |default_ch= }} OEM Alpha Networks WRG-G19 (8WRGG19..1C1G) The [[Airlink101 AR430W]], [[Airlink101 AR335W]], and [[D-Link WBR-1310 rev A1]] are also WRG-G19s. {{TechInfoDepot|D-Link_DIR-300_vA1}}
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/DIR300 DIR-300 rev A on the DD-WRT wiki]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-300 DIR-300 on the OpenWrt wiki] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/yohanes/4488923533/lightbox/ Board shot] [https://picasaweb.google.com/etthtech/DLinkDIR300A1RU Pictures], showing a IP175C switch instead of the IP175E The default SSID may be '''dlink'''.
